overrides.d1: changes gravity constant, applies once on game start
overrides.d2: overrides extra gravity values in Physics.cpr, applies on change. set to 0 to remove extra downforce when airborne
overrides.d3: beta, disabling abs and tcs, weird to do in tdu2, let me know how each item feels
overrides.d4: override angular damping values in Physics.cpr, higher values means more resistance to rotations (both turning and rolling), applies on car spawn/change
overrides.d5: steering wheel mode like in tdu1, values overrides only applies when enabled, applies on car spawn/change
overrides.d6: analog settings (controller configuration), applies on change
overrides.d7: strength of damper and spring effects, more than 1.0 will cause clipping
overrides.d8: strength of sine effects, happens during surface change, driving offroad, and redlining

multipliers.d1: multiply some values available in tdu2vpe during load, applies on car spawn/change

ffb_tweaks.d1: force feedback tweaks, applies on change
ffb_tweaks.d2: to log all effects sent to dinput8 or not
ffb_tweaks.d3: reduce damper effect as the car go faster more than the game originally does, how it feels depends on how your wheel renders damper effect
ffb_tweaks.d4: adjust spring effect begin and end force scaled on car speed, 0-10000, more than 10000 will cause clipping
